backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the SurgiPaw backend defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for surgery cases and user profiles, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, used as build/documentation reference for the project's React components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the SurgiPaw PWA, linking the app manifest, favicon, and mounting the React app via the root div and Vite module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy with precaching of the app shell on install, old cache cleanup on activate, and runtime caching of static assets while skipping auth and API requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and a sticky header with login/logout controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG icon component for the Culture workflow task rendered via WorkflowIconBase with the culture color token.
SVG icon component for the Discharge Notes workflow task showing a document with a checkmark.
SVG icon component for the Follow Up workflow task showing a circular arrow, using the followup color token.
SVG icon component for the Histopathology workflow task rendered with the histo color token.
Imaging workflow icon rendered as a grayscale PNG image asset rather than an inline SVG.
SVG icon component for the Labs workflow task depicting a test tube, using the labs color token.
SVG icon component for the PDVM Notified workflow task showing a speech bubble, using the notified color token.
SVG icon component for the Surgery Report workflow task depicting a document with a scalpel line, using the surgery color token.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Dispatcher component that maps a task type string to the corresponding workflow icon component and renders it.
Base SVG wrapper component that applies shared icon size, stroke width, and color props to all workflow icon children.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Design token constants for workflow icon colors, icon size (24px), and stroke width (2) shared across all workflow icon components.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file placeholder for an authentication React context.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file placeholder for an authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a new user to enter their name and saves their profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS configuration array for case workflow tasks and provides utility functions to get default selections, remaining items, task colors, and icon classes.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Expandable card component displaying a surgery case's details, checklist task status, and actions for editing, deleting, and toggling task completion.
Dialog form for editing an existing surgery case's fields and checklist task selections, persisting changes via the updateCase mutation.
Dialog form for creating a new surgery case with fields, checklist task selections, speech recognition input, quick-fill text parsing, and previous case lookup.
Main list view for surgery cases with search, species/task filtering, sorting, and controls to add new cases or import/export CSV.
Search input component with a clear button for filtering cases by any field.
A dropdown select component for sorting surgery cases, using predefined SORT_OPTIONS and exposing a sort value and change handler as props.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by species (canine, feline, other), persisting selections to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering surgery cases by task types and completion status, persisting filter state to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of task items for a surgery case, showing only selected tasks and allowing toggling their completed state via checkboxes.
Provides UI for exporting surgery cases to CSV and importing cases from a CSV file, with progress tracking and error reporting.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-formatting and a calendar popover picker, with auto-advance on completion.
Implements CSV export and import logic for surgery cases, including field serialization, CSV parsing with quoted-field handling, and mapping to backend data types.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, and validation constants for species, sex, boolean, and date formats.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Provides utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, and completion status using checklist item definitions.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's Web Speech API to provide speech-to-text recording with state management for transcript, errors, and recording status.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, rendered via a hidden iframe.
Generates and downloads a CSV report of all surgery cases including their remaining tasks, using browser Blob and anchor element for file download.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Provides formatting utility functions for converting backend types (Time, Species, Sex) into human-readable strings for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Provides utility functions to format Time (bigint nanoseconds), Species, and Sex enum values into human-readable strings for PDF/CSV report display.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters an array of SurgeryCase objects by matching a search query against case fields and incomplete checklist item labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/services/aiI: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a sortCases function that sorts SurgeryCase arrays by arrival date or remaining open task count.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for Species and Sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface used in case creation/editing forms.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and date parsing/formatting utilities, including conversions between Date objects and nanosecond bigints.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with filtering, sorting, searching, and PDF export capabilities, along with summary stats for open tasks and active cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from individual SurgeryCase objects and calculate the total open task count across all cases.
frontend/src/features/settings/component: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Generic React hook that debounces a value by a configurable delay, returning the debounced version to reduce rapid state updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing Internet Computer authentication via AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend canister interactions including user profiles, surgery cases, tasks, dashboard data, and OpenAI config using TanStack Query's useQuery and useMutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including colors for backgrounds, cards, complaints, and notes fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript declaration file providing full type definitions for the tesseract.js OCR library, including Worker, RecognizeResult, PSM/OEM enums, and related interfaces.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends typography and animation plugins, and sets Inter as the default font.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file describing SurgiPaw as a veterinary case management app with four pending audit/fix tasks targeting a blank-page bug caused by canister fetch failures across the backend, hooks, views, and App routing.
